title: Ghana’s role in honouring US civil rights hero WEB Du Bois
description: A state-of-the-art complex is to be built in Ghana to remember WEB Du Bois.

title: Why wives around the world do not earn as much as their husbands
description: Researchers say data from 45 countries over 40 years shows household is a place of great inequality.

title: The men going to military jail for their faith
description: Singapore has a strict military conscription programme, putting pacifists in a difficult situation.

title: Minneapolis police 'hunted' protesters with rubber bullets
description: An activist and former officer analyse video of Minneapolis police days after George Floyd's death.

title: Covid: Misleading vaccine claims target children and parents
description: The vaccine is being offered to children aged 12 and older.

title: CEO Secrets: 'No need to convince the haters you're worthy'
description: Michele Roberts, executive director of the National Basketball Players Association, shares her CEO Secrets.

title: Owain Wyn Evans: How drumming saved me
description: Owain Wyn Evans talks about growing up as a young gay man in Ammanford, and how drumming saved him.

title: Mike Tindall meets families living with Parkinson's disease
description: The former England rugby player speaks to those living with the same condition as his father.

title: Ros Atkins on... The US climate conundrum
description: Ahead of COP26, Ros Atkins looks at what the world's biggest emitters are doing to tackle climate change.

title: In-form Dykes 'doesn't get credit he deserves', says Clarke
description: Scotland match-winner Lyndon Dykes "sometimes doesn't get the credit he deserves", says head coach Steve Clarke after a nervous night in the Faroe Islands.

title: 'Eggs and sperm cloud' wins top wildlife photo award
description: An image of a bursting cloud of eggs and sperm as groupers mate in the Pacific is the judges' pick.

title: Police dashcam shows close call during highway crash
description: A Florida police officer inspecting a flat tire had to suddenly dodge a crashing vehicle.

title: Climate change: 'Adapt or die' warning from Environment Agency
description: The Environment Agency says hundreds could die in a flooding event at some point.

title: Haulier shortage: Keir Starmer fails mock lorry driving test
description: The Labour leader is warned to move to the left while visiting a HGV driver training centre and taking a lesson.

title: Covid: Not my job to sugarcoat advice, says Sir Patrick Vallance
description: The chief scientific adviser says he does not just tell the government what it wants to hear.

title: UK job vacancies reach 20-year high
description: Retailers and car mechanics are in particular demand as job vacancies surge to 1.1 million.

title: Tributes paid to British diving coach Jenkins after death aged 31
description: Tributes have been paid to British diving coach David Jenkins, who died at the weekend at the age of 31.

title: Pensions: Experts say £10,900 annual income needed to retire
description: The budget for a minimum standard of living increases to £16,700 for a couple, the calculations suggest.

title: Covid response one of UK's worst health failures  - report
description: Government too slow to lock down and test-and-trace was chaotic, but jabs rollout was a success, MPs say.

title: Delivery driver killed cyclist while high on drugs
description: Jonathon Ramsbottom had cocaine and cannabis in his system when the crash happened, court hears.

title: Wales striker Moore frustrated by refereeing decisions in World Cup qualification
description: Wales striker Kieffer Moore says he is "frustrated" by the disciplinary decisions of referees during their World Cup qualification campaign.

title: Sarah Everard murder: Emma B says Wayne Couzens exposed himself to her
description: The DJ says that when she reported the matter to police, officers laughed about what had happened.

title: Charity asks Tory MP who confuses two Asian ministers to step back from role
description: The Conservative denies saying "they all look the same to me" after the mix-up at a parliamentary event.

title: Fred Dinenage steps down as TV news anchor after 38 years
description: The well-known broadcaster is retiring from his news anchor role at ITV Meridian.

title: Covid inquiry: When will it happen and how does it work?
description: There have been calls for an independent public inquiry into the UK's pandemic response to start immediately.

title: 'I'll be right in there' -  Murray prepares to face Zverev
description: Andy Murray says he will be "right in there" against Alexander Zverev as they prepare to face at Indian Wells - but only if he brings his A-game.

title: Nicki Minaj defends Jesy Nelson in 'blackfishing' row
description: The pair went on Instagram live to discuss the backlash to their song.

title: 'I was very bored' - O'Sullivan criticises 'flat' Belfast crowd
description: Ronnie O'Sullivan is left unimpressed by the "flat" atmosphere at the Northern Ireland Open after making it through to the last 32.

title: Footballers demand compensation over 'data misuse'
description: A group of 850 players has threatened legal action against 17 companies over the use of their data.

title: France: Train kills three migrants lying on tracks
description: The migrants were struck by the train in a southern coastal town near Biarritz on Tuesday morning.

title: Elk wandering Colorado for two years with tyre around neck is freed
description: Wildlife officers in the US state of Colorado say the elk is in good shape after removing its antlers.

title: The Papers: 'Damning' Covid report, and gas crisis loans
description: Several of Tuesday's papers focus on a new inquiry by MPs into how the UK handled the pandemic.

title: From a Borders village to the Royal Swedish Ballet
description: Calum Lowden becomes principal dancer - despite admitting he is "not the most supple person".

title: Euromillions: UK's biggest ever lottery jackpot up for grabs
description: If a single UK ticket-holder wins the £184m Euromillions prize, they will be the UK's richest ever winner.

title: Call Her Daddy's Alex Cooper: 'Not everyone can just do a podcast'
description: Call Her Daddy host Alex Cooper has relaunched her podcast after getting a huge deal with Spotify.

title: Interpreter who helped rescue Biden in 2008 leaves Afghanistan
description: Aman Khalili had asked Joe Biden for help 13 years after he rescued the then-senator from a storm.
